txt.en: A jug of water can be found near Tansy Tighfield at the Party Tree.\n\nYou should collect the jug of water.

Due to extremely hot weather conditions at the summer festival, you have been asked to find a creative way to cool off the overheated patrons.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends.</rgb>
These patrons certainly need cooling off!
These patrons could use some cool water
These patrons look like they could use some water sprinkled on them
Tansy Tighfield can be found at the party tree in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak with Tansy Tighfield.
These poor patrons look awfully hot
'You... you spit on the patrons? That certainly wasn't what I had in mind. Though if they seemed to enjoy it, I guess it'll do! Thank you, I think.'
Collect the jug of cool water

'This is a mighty hot summer, [placeholder]. Many of the patrons don't seem to be enjoying the festival as much this year, due to this miserable heat.\n\n'Can you think of a way to cool them off? If only we had a fountain in Hobbiton!'
Collected the jug of cool water
Overheated patrons can be found throughout Hobbiton.\n\nYou should use the water creatively to help cool off overheated patrons.
Picked up the jug of water
Collect the jug of cold water
